snippet.title: Atari Lynx Longplay [38] Dracula: The Undead
snippet.description:
http://www.longplays.org

Played by: NPI

This looks like a point and click adventure, without a mouse. Bram Stoker is alive in this game and he is narrating the story of Johnathan (You) who somehow got into the land of Transylvania. Along the game you must take notes so you can kill Dracula in the end and get the good ending. At 00:36:02 I added the bad ending, that you get if you don't take notes. Not much of a difference, tho. -
Disclaimer: Most videos by World of Longplays use SaveStates!
